arStrings.szText: When you cast {c_number}[SF_2]{/c} {c_important}Gorilla{/c}, {c_important}Jaguar{/c}, {c_important}Eagle{/c}, or {c_important}Centipede{/c} Skills with the same Spirit in a row, restore {c_number}[SF_1*100|%|]{/c} of your Vigor and deal {c_number}[SF_4*100|x%|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}[SF_3]{/c} seconds.
